item.description: Let's get together for a pot luck dinner at my home. It should provide a chance to get together in a relaxed setting and get to know each other a little better. Pick a dish you'd like to bring or I can suggest something. This get together is limited to 10 for this first event so if you're interested sign up now. I won't be accepting "maybe" for this event for the sake of getting an accurate count. See you then.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: Pot Luck Dinner
